amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part A of House Report 115-783 to increase funding for Gulf War illness research under the Defense Health Program by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Soto.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
